name: Strong Winds
description: Strong wind currents lift and swirl everything in the air, from a tiny pebble to a giant truck. You are either being swept around or falling straight to the floor at great speed.
effect:
-Electric, Ice and Rock Type Moves deal neutral damage to Flying-Type Pok√©mon.
-Hazards are cleared and cannot be set during the duration.
-Flying type and Wind Based moves may be used with +1 Priority.
